Title: Chirpy Burpy Cheap Sheep
Plot: Ted gets mixed up in a web of intrigue and double-cross when he bets the Parochial House heating budget on Chris, the burping sheep. The lads bring Chris to stay at the house in an attempt to improve his chances at 'King of the Sheep 98', but can Ted quell his burping in time for the great day?
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
GuestStars: Peadar Lamb, Peter Dineen, Pat McGrath, Eamon Rohan
